availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elisha Low (Mercer County, Kentucky, shoe maker and jailor.)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, shoe maker and jailor. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Low. Father of Minerva Low, Hannah Low, Benjamin Low, Sarah Low, Mary E. Low. Shoe Maker in Mercer County in 1850. Jailor in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 347B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, p. 713.
